lead_paragraph: In the southwest Pacific all roads lead to Rabaul. This has been the point of convergence for the entire Allied campaign both on New Guinea and up through the Solomons. Now our Marines are on Bougainville, the bridgehead to Rabaul.
snippet: In the southwest Pacific all roads lead to Rabaul. This has been the point of convergence for the entire Allied campaign both on New Guinea and up through the Solomons. Now our Marines are on Bougainville, the bridgehead to Rabaul....
